original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso yaṁ imasmiṁ jambudīpe tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṁ taṁ chetvā ekajjhaṁ saṁharitvā caturaṅgulaṁ caturaṅgulaṁ ghaṭikaṁ katvā nikkhipeyya:
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ yam imasmin jambudīpe tiṇa kaṭṭha sākhā palāsam tam chetvā ekajjham saharitvā catur aṅgulam catur aṅgulam ghaṭikam katvā nikkhipeyya

original: ‘ayaṁ me mātā, tassā me mātu ayaṁ mātā’ti, apariyādinnāva, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa
analyzed: ayam me mātā tassāḥ me mātu ayam mātā ati a pariyādinnā va bhikkhave tassa purisassa

original: mātumātaro assu, atha imasmiṁ jambudīpe tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṁ parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya.
analyzed: mātu mātaraḥ assu atha imasmin jambudīpe tiṇa kaṭṭha sākhā palāsam parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Evaṁ dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ tibbaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ byasanaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ, kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
analyzed: evam dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave dukkham paccanubhūtam tibbam paccanubhūtam byasanam paccanubhūta kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ alaṁ virajjituṁ alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditum alam virajjitum alam vimuccitum ti

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso imaṁ mahāpathaviṁ kolaṭṭhimattaṁ kolaṭṭhimattaṁ mattikāguḷikaṁ karitvā nikkhipeyya:
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ imam mahā pathavim kolaṭṭhi mattam kolaṭṭhi mattam mattikā guḷikam karitvā nikkhipeyya

original: ‘ayaṁ me pitā, tassa me pitu ayaṁ pitā’ti, apariyādinnāva bhikkhave, tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu, athāyaṁ mahāpathavī parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya.
analyzed: ayam me pitā tassa me pitu ayam pitā ati a pariyādinnāḥ ava bhikkhave tassa purisassa pitu pitaraḥ assu atha ayam mahā pathavī parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Evaṁ dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ tibbaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ byasanaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ, kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
analyzed: evam dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave dukkham paccanubhūtam tibbam paccanubhūtam byasanam paccanubhūta kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu nti

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho bahutara yat vā vaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā

original: sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṁ rodantānaṁ assu
analyzed: sandhāvatam sasaratam amanāpa sampayogā manāpa vippayogā kandantānam rodantānam assu

original: passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, yaṁ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakan”ti?
analyzed: passannam yam vā catūsu mahā samuddesu udakanti

original: “Yathā kho mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāma, etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ
analyzed: yathā kho bhante bhagavatā dhammam desitam ājānāma etat eva bhante bahutara

original: yaṁ no iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā
analyzed: yam naḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasaratam amanāpa sampayogā manāpa vippayogā

original: kandantānaṁ rodantānaṁ assu passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakan”ti.
analyzed: kandantānam rodantānam assu passannam paggharita na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu udakanti

original: “Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave, sādhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhikkhave sādhu kho me tumhe bhikkhave evam dhammam desitam ājānātha

original: Etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutaraṁ yaṁ vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ
analyzed: etat eva bhikkhave bahutaram yam vaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasarata

original: amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṁ rodantānaṁ assu passannaṁ paggharitaṁ,
analyzed: amanāpa sampayogā manāpa vippayogā kandantānam rodantānam assu passannam paggharita
na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu
dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave mātu maraṇam paccanubhūta

original: tesaṁ vo mātumaraṇaṁ paccanubhontānaṁ amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṁ rodantānaṁ assu passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakaṁ.
analyzed: tesam vaḥ mātu maraṇam paccanubhontānam amanāpa sampayogā manāpa vippayogā kandantānam rodantānam assu passannam paggharita na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu udaka
dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave pitu maraṇam paccanubhūtam pe

original: Dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, rogabyasanaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ, tesaṁ vo rogabyasanaṁ paccanubhontānaṁ
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave roga byasanam tesam vaḥ roga byasanam

original: amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṁ rodantānaṁ assu passannaṁ paggharitaṁ,
analyzed: amanāpa sampayogā manāpa vippayogā kandantānam rodantānam assu passannam paggharita
na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu

original: yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu nti

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ mātuthaññaṁ pītaṁ, yaṁ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakan”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho bahutara yam vā vaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasaratam mātuthaññam pīta yam vā catūsu mahā samuddesu udakanti

original: “Yathā kho mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāma, etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ
analyzed: yathā kho bhante bhagavatā dhammam desitam ājānāma etat eva bhante bahutara

original: yaṁ no iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ mātuthaññaṁ pītaṁ, na tveva catūsu
analyzed: yam naḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasaratam mātuthaññam pīta na tu eva catūsu

original: “Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave, sādhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhikkhave sādhu kho me tumhe bhikkhave evam dhammam desitam ājānātha

original: Etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutaraṁ yaṁ vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ mātuthaññaṁ pītaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakaṁ.
analyzed: etat eva bhikkhave bahutaram yam vaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasaratam mātuthaññam pīta na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu udaka

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: So na sukaro saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassāni iti vā, ettakāni vassasatāni iti vā, ettakāni vassasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassāni iti vā”ti.
analyzed: saḥ na sukaraḥ saṅkhātum ettakāni vassāni iti vā ettakāni vassa satāni iti vā ettakāni vassa sahassāni iti vā ettakāni vassa sata sahassāni iti vā ati

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, mahāselo pabbato yojanaṁ āyāmena yojanaṁ vitthārena yojanaṁ ubbedhena acchinno asusiro ekagghano.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhu mahāselaḥ pabbataḥ yojanam āyāmena yojanam vitthārena yojanam ubbedhena acchinnaḥ a su siraḥ eka ghanaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena kāsikena vatthena sakiṁ sakiṁ parimajjeyya.
analyzed: tam enam purisaḥ vassa satassa vassa satassa accayena kāsikena vatthena sakim sakim parimajjeyya

original: Khippataraṁ kho so, bhikkhu, mahāselo pabbato iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, na tveva kappo.
analyzed: khippataram kho saḥ bhikkhu mahāselaḥ pabbataḥ iminā upakkamena parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya na tu eva kappo

original: Evaṁ dīghānaṁ kho, bhikkhu, kappānaṁ neko kappo saṁsito, nekaṁ kappasataṁ saṁsitaṁ, nekaṁ kappasahassaṁ saṁsitaṁ, nekaṁ kappasatasahassaṁ saṁsitaṁ.
analyzed: evam dīghānam kho bhikkhu kappānam nekaḥ kappaḥ sasitaḥ nekam kappa satam sasita nekam kappa sahassam sasita nekam kappa sata sahassam sasita

original: yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhu, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvañcida bhikkhu alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu nti

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena bhagavā pe ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: So na sukaro saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassāni iti vā …pe… ettakāni vassasatasahassāni iti vā”ti.
analyzed: saḥ na sukaraḥ saṅkhātum ettakāni vassāni iti vā pe ettakāni vassa sata sahassāni iti vā ati

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, āyasaṁ nagaraṁ yojanaṁ āyāmena yojanaṁ vitthārena yojanaṁ ubbedhena, puṇṇaṁ sāsapānaṁ guḷikābaddhaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhu āyasam nagaram yojanam āyāmena yojanam vitthārena yojanam ubbedhena puṇṇam sāsapānam guḷikā baddha

original: Tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṁ sāsapaṁ uddhareyya.
analyzed: tatas purisaḥ vassa satassa vassa satassa accayena ekam ekam sāsapam uddhareyya

original: Khippataraṁ kho so, bhikkhu, mahāsāsaparāsi iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, na tveva kappo.
analyzed: khippataram kho saḥ bhikkhu mahā sāsa parāsi iminā upakkamena parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya na tu eva kappo

original: Evaṁ dīghānaṁ kho, bhikkhu, kappānaṁ neko kappo saṁsito, nekaṁ kappasataṁ saṁsitaṁ, nekaṁ kappasahassaṁ saṁsitaṁ, nekaṁ kappasatasahassaṁ saṁsitaṁ.
analyzed: evam dīghānam kho bhikkhu kappānam nekaḥ kappaḥ sasitaḥ nekam kappa satam sasita nekam kappa sahassam sasita nekam kappa sata sahassam sasita

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena bhagavā pe ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “kīvabahukā nu kho, bhante, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti?
analyzed: kīvabahukāḥ nu kho bhante kappāḥ abbhatītāḥ atikkantā ati
bahukāḥ kho bhikkhave kappāḥ abbhatītāḥ atikkantā

original: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’”ti.
analyzed: ettakā kappā iti vā ettakāni kappa satāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sahassāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sata sahassāni iti vā ati
idhassu bhikkhave cattāro sāvakā vassa sata āyukā vassa sata jīvino

original: Te divase divase kappasatasahassaṁ kappasatasahassaṁ anussareyyuṁ.
analyzed: te divase divase kappa sata sahassam kappa sata sahassam anussareyyu

original: Ananussaritāva, bhikkhave, tehi kappā assu, atha kho te cattāro sāvakā vassasatāyukā vassasatajīvino vassasatassa accayena kālaṁ kareyyuṁ.
analyzed: an anussaritā ava bhikkhave tehi kappāḥ assu atha kho te cattāro sāvakāḥ vassa sata āyukāḥ vassa sata jīvinaḥ vassa satassa accayena kālam kareyyu

original: Evaṁ bahukā kho, bhikkhave, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā.
analyzed: evam bahukāḥ kho bhikkhave kappāḥ abbhatītāḥ atikkantā

original: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’ti.
analyzed: ettakā kappā iti vā ettakāni kappa satāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sahassāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sata sahassāni iti vā ati

original: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kīvabahukā nu kho, bho gotama, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti?
analyzed: kīvabahukāḥ nu khalu bho gotama kappāḥ abbhatītāḥ atikkantā ati
bahukā kho brāhmaṇa kappāḥ abbhatītāḥ atikkantā

original: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’”ti.
analyzed: ettakā kappā iti vā ettakāni kappa satāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sahassāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sata sahassāni iti vā ati
sakkā pana bho gotamaḥ upamam kātunti

original: “Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, yato cāyaṁ gaṅgā nadī pabhavati yattha ca mahāsamuddaṁ appeti, yā etasmiṁ antare vālikā sā na sukarā saṅkhātuṁ:
analyzed: sā iyyathā api brāhmaṇa yatas ca ayam gaṅgā nadī pabhavati yattha ca mahā samuddam appeti yā etasmin antare vālikā sā na sukarā

original: ‘ettakā vālikā iti vā, ettakāni vālikasatāni iti vā, ettakāni vālikasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni vālikasatasahassāni iti vā’ti.
analyzed: ettakāḥ vālikāḥ iti vā ettakāni vālika satāni iti vā ettakāni vālika sahassāni iti vā ettakāni vālika sata sahassāni iti vā ati

original: Tato bahutarā kho, brāhmaṇa, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā.
analyzed: tatas bahutarā kho brāhmaṇa kappāḥ abbhatītāḥ atikkantā

original: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’ti.
analyzed: ettakā kappā iti vā ettakāni kappa satāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sahassāni iti vā ettakāni kappa sata sahassāni iti vā ati

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Evaṁ dīgharattaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, dukkhaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ tibbaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ byasanaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ, kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
analyzed: evam dīgharattam kho brāhmaṇa dukkham paccanubhūtam tibbam paccanubhūtam byasanam paccanubhūta kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, brāhmaṇa, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: brāhmaṇa alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
abhikkanta bho gotama abhikkanta bho gotama pe

original: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, daṇḍo uparivehāsaṁ khitto sakimpi mūlena nipatati, sakimpi majjhena nipatati, sakimpi antena nipatati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave daṇḍaḥ upari vehāsam khittaḥ sakimpi mūlena nipatati sakimpi majjhena nipatati sakimpi antena nipatati

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇā sattā taṇhāsaṁyojanā sandhāvantā saṁsarantā sakimpi asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ gacchanti, sakimpi parasmā lokā imaṁ lokaṁ āgacchanti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave avijjā nīvaraṇā sattā taṇhā sayojanā sandhāvantā sa sarantā sakim pi asmā lokā param lokam gacchanti sakim pi parasmā lokā imam lokam āgacchanti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate

original: ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, kappaṁ sandhāvato saṁsarato siyā evaṁ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi yathāyaṁ vepullo pabbato, sace saṁhārako assa, sambhatañca na vinasseyya.
analyzed: eka puggalassa bhikkhave kappam sandhāvataḥ sasarataḥ siyā evam mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalaḥ aṭṭhi puñjaḥ aṭṭhirāsi yathā ayam vepullaḥ pabbataḥ sace sahārakaḥ assa sambhatam ca na vinasseyya

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, passeyyātha duggataṁ durūpetaṁ niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
analyzed: ya bhikkhave passeyyātha duggatam durūpetam niṭṭham ettha gantabba

original: yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ alaṁ virajjituṁ alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditum alam virajjitum alam vimuccitum ti

original: yaṁ, bhikkhave, passeyyātha sukhitaṁ susajjitaṁ, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ:
analyzed: ya bhikkhave passeyyātha sukhitam su sajjita niṭṭham ettha gantabba

original: Atha kho tiṁsamattā pāveyyakā bhikkhū sabbe āraññikā sabbe piṇḍapātikā sabbe paṁsukūlikā
analyzed: atha kho tisamattā pāveyyakāḥ bhikkhū sabbe āraññikā sabbe piṇḍapātikā sabbe pasukūlikā

original: sabbe tecīvarikā sabbe sasaṁyojanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: sabbe sabbe sa sayojanā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavanta

original: “ime kho tiṁsamattā pāveyyakā bhikkhū sabbe āraññikā sabbe piṇḍapātikā sabbe paṁsukūlikā sabbe tecīvarikā sabbe sasaṁyojanā.
analyzed: ime kho tisa mattā pāveyyakā bhikkhū sabbe āraññikā sabbe piṇḍapātikā sabbe pasukūlikā sabbe tecīvarikā sabbe sa sayojanā

original: Yannūnāhaṁ imesaṁ tathā dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ yathā nesaṁ imasmiṁyeva āsane anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucceyyun”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham imesam tathā dhammam deseyyam yathā na īsam imasmiya eva āsane an upādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucceyyun ti

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho bahutara yat vā vaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā

original: sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, yaṁ vā catūsu
analyzed: sandhāvatam sasaratam sīsacchinnānam lohitam passannam paggharita yam vā catūsu

original: “Yathā kho mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāma, etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ,
analyzed: yathā kho bhante bhagavatā dhammam desitam ājānāma etat eva bhante bahutara

original: yaṁ no iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ
analyzed: yam naḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasaratam sīsa chinnānam lohitam

original: paggharitaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakan”ti.
analyzed: na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu

original: “Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave, sādhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānātha.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhikkhave sādhu kho me tumhe bhikkhave evam dhammam desitam ājānātha

original: Etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakaṁ.
analyzed: etat eva bhikkhave bahutara yam vaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvatam sasaratam sīsacchinnānam lohitam passannam paggharita na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu udaka

original: Dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, gunnaṁ sataṁ gobhūtānaṁ sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakaṁ.
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave gunnam satam go bhūtānam sīsa chinnānam lohitam passannam paggharita na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu udaka

original: Dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, mahiṁsānaṁ sataṁ mahiṁsabhūtānaṁ sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ …pe…
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave mahisānam satam mahisa bhūtānam sīsa chinnānam lohitam passannam paggharitam pe

original: dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, urabbhānaṁ sataṁ urabbhabhūtānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave urabbhānam satam urabbha bhūtānam pe

original: dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, corā gāmaghātāti gahetvā sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ.
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave corāḥ gāma ghātāti gahetvā sīsa chinnānam lohitam passannam

original: Dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, corā pāripanthikāti gahetvā sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ.
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave corā pāripanthikā ati gahetvā sīsa chinnānam lohitam passannam

original: Dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, corā pāradārikāti gahetvā sīsacchinnānaṁ lohitaṁ passannaṁ paggharitaṁ, na tveva catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakaṁ.
analyzed: dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave corā pāradārikā ati gahetvā sīsa chinnānam lohitam passannam paggharita na tu eva catūsu mahā samuddesu udaka

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne tiṁsamattānaṁ pāveyyakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
analyzed: imasmin ca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tisamattānam pāveyyakānam bhikkhūnam an upādāya āsavehi cittāni vimuccisūti

original: na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharūpo yo namātābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā.
analyzed: na saḥ bhikkhave sattaḥ sulabha rūpaḥ yaḥ namātā abhūta pubbaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā

original: na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharūpo yo napitābhūtapubbo …pe…
analyzed: na saḥ bhikkhave sattaḥ sulabha rūpaḥ yaḥ na pitā a bhūta pubbaḥ pe

original: “na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharūpo yo nabhātābhūtapubbo …pe…
analyzed: na saḥ bhikkhave sattaḥ sulabha rūpaḥ yaḥ pe

original: “na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharūpo yo nabhaginibhūtapubbo …pe…
analyzed: na saḥ bhikkhave sattaḥ sulabha rūpaḥ yaḥ na bhagini bhūta pubbaḥ pe

original: “na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharūpo yo naputtabhūtapubbo …pe…
analyzed: na saḥ bhikkhave sattaḥ sulabha rūpaḥ yaḥ naputta bhūta pubbaḥ pe

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Na so, bhikkhave, satto sulabharūpo yo na dhītābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā.
analyzed: na saḥ bhikkhave sattaḥ sulabha rūpaḥ yaḥ na dhīta a bhūta pubbaḥ iminā dīghena addhunā

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Evaṁ dīgharattaṁ vo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ tibbaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ byasanaṁ paccanubhūtaṁ, kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
analyzed: evam dīgharattam vaḥ bhikkhave dukkham paccanubhūtam tibbam paccanubhūtam byasanam paccanubhūta kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu nti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate

original: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṁ sattānaṁ taṇhāsaṁyojanānaṁ sandhāvataṁ saṁsarataṁ.
analyzed: pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānam sattānam taṇhā sayojanānam sandhāvatam sasarata

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘pācīnavaṁso’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave imassa vepullassa pabbatassa pācīnavaso tvā iva samaññā udapādi

original: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussānaṁ ‘tivarā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: tena kho pana bhikkhave samayena manussānam tivarā tvā iva samaññā udapādi

original: Tivarānaṁ, bhikkhave, manussānaṁ cattārīsa vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi.
analyzed: bhikkhave manussānam cattārīsa vassa sahassāni āyu ppamāṇam ahosi

original: Tivarā, bhikkhave, manussā pācīnavaṁsaṁ pabbataṁ catūhena ārohanti, catūhena orohanti.
analyzed: tivarā bhikkhave manussā pācīnavasam pabbatam catūhena ārohanti catūhena orohanti

original: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kakusandho bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana bhikkhave samayena kakusandhaḥ bhagavā arahan sammāsambuddhaḥ loke uppannaḥ hoti

original: Kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa vidhurasañjīvaṁ nāma sāvakayugaṁ ahosi aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
analyzed: kakusandhassa bhikkhave bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa vidhurasañjīvam nāma sāvaka yugam ahosi aggam bhadda yuga

original: Passatha, bhikkhave, sā cevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā, te ca manussā kālaṅkatā, so ca bhagavā parinibbuto.
analyzed: passatha bhikkhave sā ceva imassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā te ca manussā kālaṅkatā saḥ ca bhagavā parinibbutaḥ

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccituṁ.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘vaṅkako’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave imassa vepullassa pabbatassa vaṅkakotvā iva samaññā udapādi

original: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussānaṁ ‘rohitassā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: tena kho pana bhikkhave samayena manussānam rohitassa atu eva samaññā udapādi

original: Rohitassānaṁ, bhikkhave, manussānaṁ tiṁsavassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi.
analyzed: bhikkhave manussānam tisa vassa sahassāni āyu ppamāṇam ahosi

original: Rohitassā, bhikkhave, manussā vaṅkakaṁ pabbataṁ tīhena ārohanti, tīhena orohanti.
analyzed: rohitassa bhikkhave manussāḥ vaṅkakam pabbatam tīhena ārohanti tīhena orohanti

original: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena koṇāgamano bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana bhikkhave samayena koṇāgamanaḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ loke uppannaḥ hoti

original: Koṇāgamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa bhiyyosuttaraṁ nāma sāvakayugaṁ ahosi aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
analyzed: koṇāgamanassa bhikkhave bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa bhiyyosuttaram nāma sāvaka yugam ahosi aggam bhadda yuga

original: Passatha, bhikkhave, sā cevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā, te ca manussā kālaṅkatā, so ca bhagavā parinibbuto.
analyzed: passatha bhikkhave sā ceva imassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā te ca manussā kālaṅkatā saḥ ca bhagavā parinibbutaḥ

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘supasso’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave imassa vepullassa pabbatassa supassā utvā iva samaññā udapādi

original: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussānaṁ ‘suppiyā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: tena kho pana bhikkhave samayena manussānam suppiyā tvā iva samaññā udapādi

original: Suppiyānaṁ, bhikkhave, manussānaṁ vīsativassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi.
analyzed: bhikkhave manussānam vīsati vassa sahassāni āyu ppamāṇam ahosi

original: Suppiyā, bhikkhave, manussā supassaṁ pabbataṁ dvīhena ārohanti, dvīhena orohanti.
analyzed: suppiyāḥ bhikkhave manussā supassam pabbatam dvīhena ārohanti dvīhena orohanti

original: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kassapo bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana bhikkhave samayena kassapaḥ bhagavā arahan sammāsambuddhaḥ loke uppannaḥ hoti

original: Kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa tissabhāradvājaṁ nāma sāvakayugaṁ ahosi aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
analyzed: kassapassa bhikkhave bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa tissabhāradvājam nāma sāvaka yugam ahosi aggam bhadda yuga

original: Passatha, bhikkhave, sā cevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā, te ca manussā kālaṅkatā, so ca bhagavā parinibbuto.
analyzed: passatha bhikkhave sā ceva imassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā te ca manussā kālaṅkatā saḥ ca bhagavā parinibbutaḥ

original: Etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘vepullo’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: etarahi kho pana bhikkhave imassa vepullassa pabbatassa vepullaḥ tu eva samaññā udapādi

original: Etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imesaṁ manussānaṁ ‘māgadhakā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
analyzed: etarahi kho pana bhikkhave imesam manussānam māgadha kātvā iva samaññā udapādi

original: Māgadhakānaṁ, bhikkhave, manussānaṁ appakaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ parittaṁ lahukaṁ;
analyzed: māgadhakāna bhikkhave manussānam appakam āyu ppamāṇam parittam lahuka

original: yo ciraṁ jīvati so vassasataṁ appaṁ vā bhiyyo.
analyzed: yaḥ ciram jīvati saḥ vassa satam appam vā bhiyyas

original: Māgadhakā, bhikkhave, manussā vepullaṁ pabbataṁ muhuttena ārohanti muhuttena orohanti.
analyzed: māgadhakāḥ bhikkhave manussāḥ vepullam pabbatam muhuttena ārohanti muhuttena orohanti

original: Etarahi kho panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno.
analyzed: etarahi kho pana āha bhikkhave araham sammāsambuddhaḥ loke uppannaḥ

original: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallānaṁ nāma sāvakayugaṁ aggaṁ bhaddayugaṁ.
analyzed: mayham kho pana bhikkhave sāriputta moggallānam nāma sāvaka yugam aggam bhaddayuga

original: Bhavissati, bhikkhave, so samayo yā ayañcevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antaradhāyissati, ime ca manussā kālaṁ karissanti, ahañca parinibbāyissāmi.
analyzed: bhavissati bhikkhave saḥ samayaḥ yā ayam ceva imassa pabbatassa samaññā antaradhāyissati ime ca manussā kālam karissanti aham ca parinibbāyissāmi

original: Yāvañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṁ, alaṁ virajjituṁ, alaṁ vimuccitun”ti.
analyzed: yāvat cita bhikkhave alam eva sabba saṅkhāresu nibbinditu alam virajjitu alam vimuccitu nti

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā
an am a tagga sayuttam samatta
